subject: How can I run a test suit in other program?
msgSnippet: In Junit 3, I can do something like: TestResult result = TestRunner.run(new TestSuite(AllTests.class)); Main.this.info( Test run: +result.runCount());
messageBody:
In Junit 3, I can do something like:

TestResult result = TestRunner.run(new TestSuite(AllTests.class));
Main.this.info("Test run: "+result.runCount());
Main.this.warn("Test fail: "+result.failures().toString());
Main.this.error("Test error: "+result.errors().toString());

Can I do similar thing in junit4?
